version_description:
2.7.5 版：
- 全新[闪聊]功能：系统匹配视频聊天对象，30秒拓展你的交际圈；
- 优化关注列表排序、个人资料页展示；
- 优化连线观众展示；
- 优化直播间，提升稳定性；
- 修复 bug 并提升性能。

近期更新：
- 独家财富等级：氪金用户独家专属，尊享等级特权与荣耀；
- 视频通话优化：小窗通话功能全新上线，边刷动态边聊天，探索精彩两不误；
- 安全升级：绑定邮箱，找回密码，以备不时之需。

- [我的账户]：全新账户管理，实现多种方式登录；
- [我的钱包]：更方便地管理你在 Blued 的礼物及余额；
- [个人资料页]：左右滑动，可以查看列表内的其他用户；
- [新面孔] 全面升级：在列表中一并查看刚到你附近的用户；
- [阅后即焚] 正式回归，放下包袱，尽情畅聊；
- 优化直播间，提升稳定性；
- 修复 bug 并提升性能。

2.7.8 版：
- 闪聊：新增更多面具，各类风格，尽情选择；
- 修复 bug 并提升性能。

近期更新：
- [阅后即焚]：阅后即焚正式回归，放下包袱，尽情畅聊；
- [消息撤回]：支持聊天内容1小时内撤回，发错消息也不怕；
- [新面孔]：在列表中一并查看刚到你附近的用户；
- [我的账户]：全新账户管理，实现多种方式登录；
- [我的钱包]：更方便地管理你在 Blued 的礼物及余额。

2.7.9 Version:
- Bug fixed and other improvements.

Recent Updates:
- [Video Match]: Add 8 masks with all kinds of designs;
- [Timer]: Your pictures and blinks can be deleted automatically after 5 secs;
- [Message Recall]: Regret having sent a message? You can recall it within an hour;
- [New Faces]: Besides new users and newly-changed profile photos, you can also see guys who just arrived in your area now;
- [My Account]: Account management renewed, multiple login options now available;
- [My Wallet]: Now easier for you to check your Gifts and Balance.

- Blued Premium has launched: More Convenient、More Private、More Privilege
- Bug fixed and other improvements.

1. You can sending gifts with Auto-Strike now.The numbers will jump out and add up, and the effect is clear at a glance!
2. Bug fixed and other improvements.

- Beans Battle: Warhorn has been blown, warpaint has been drawn. It's time to fight!
- Popularity Battle: Win the Popularity Battle by getting the most daggers and cannons. You can defy the power of the rich and famous!
- Bug fixed and other improvements.

- You can sending gifts with Auto-Strike now. The numbers will jump out and add up, and the effect is clear at a glance!
- Bug fixed and other improvements

- Filter your conversations:Focus on the people you care about the MOST. Especially when they are HOT
- Bug fixed and other improvements.

To celebrate International Pride Month, we are going all out for the raindow! A new look, a new Blued!

#BlueIntern Programme is now open! If you are LGBTQIA+ friendly and want to join Blued, please stay tuned with our official social media account and in-app messages for more information!

2.8.19:
- Recent Photos: Choose and send from your Recent Photos, easier than ever;
- Local Host: Find your local hotties easily on the brand new local page;
- Magic Gift: The coolest gifts ever are now available.
Recent Updates:
-[Live] Filters: More effects, More choices;
-[Compact Invitations]: All private Live invitations are now in only one notification;
-[Local Videos Upload]: Share your local videos and more interesting things;
-[Voice LIVE]: Connect with your friends all the time;
-[Nearby LIVE]: Who are the hot guys around you.

#BlueIntern Programme is now open! If you are LGBTQIA+ friendly and want to join Blued, please stay tuned with our official social media account and in-app messages for more information!

Recent Updates:
- Brand-new host level privileges are online. Get more fun with live stream;
- Instant notifications for new messages, never miss any Mr. Right.

2.8.16:
- Say hi to your New Friend, and Vividly;
- The Russian version went live;
- Bug fixed and other improvements.
Recent Updates:
-[Live] Filters: More effects, More choices;
-[Compact Invitations]: All private Live invitations are now in only one notification;
-[Local Videos Upload]: Share your local videos and more interesting things;
-[Voice LIVE]: Connect with your friends all the time;
-[Nearby LIVE]: Who are the hot guys around you.

2.8.14:
- [Live] Filters: More effects, More choices;
- Bug fixed and other improvements.

Recent Updates:
- [Compact Invitations]: Less distractions! All private Live invitations are now in only one notification;
- [Applyfree Group]: Join freely! Group owners can now automatically approve new members to join their groups;
- [Local Videos Upload]: Share your local videos, as well as more interesting things;
- [Sync with Instagram]: Synching your Instagram is now simpler. Easily share your moments with your friends;
- [Voice LIVE]: Open your Voice LIVE Room and connect with your friends all the time;
- [Nearby LIVE]: Who are the hot guys around you? Find the one you are looking for;
- [Multi-Accounts]: You can own more than one account now. Multiply the fun with your new account.

2.8.0 Version:
- Explore the brand new interface design style.

Recent Updates:
- [Timer]: Your pictures and blinks can be deleted automatically after 5 secs;
- [Message Recall]: Regret having sent a message? You can recall it within an hour;
- [New Faces]: Besides new users and newly-changed profile photos, you can also see guys who just arrived in your area now;
- [My Account]: Account management renewed, multiple login options now available;
- [My Wallet]: Now easier for you to check your Gifts and Balance.
